Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Westbound Reroute near Belmont/Kostner
ShortDescription: Westbound 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Pulaski, Diversey, Cicero and Belmont: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Kostner.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Pulaski, Diversey, Cicero and Belmont: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Kostner.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier raised bridge over the Chicago River. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Brown Line trains are running with residual delays after earlier bridge lift at the Chicago River, downtown.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Pink Line Service at Clinton
ShortDescription: Green and Pink Line trains are standing at Clinton due to a raised bridge over the Chicago River. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

Some trains may be either held or rerouted before reaching the bridge (in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route). Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge operation. Allow extra travel time.
